title: حبيبتي تنهض من نومها
description: This book is part of the Mahmoud Darwish series of poetry and prose books. This is the first edition by The Mahmoud Darwish Foundation, Al Ahlia, and Dar Al Nasher published in 2013. The series features an attractive design, excellent finish, and easy to read colors and fonts.
author: Mahmoud Darwish
